page.title: 08A FARM WORKER
page.content: My dad is a farm worker and drives a tractor every day. Sometimes he ploughs the fields. The other day he put a cover on the{fertilizer tank}in the morning and cleaned straw out of the{Dutch barns}in the afternoon. In summer he drives the{combine}harvester and is looking forward to having a new one, larger than the other two. He goes to work at 7.00 a.m., comes in for breakfast at half past seven and then works until 12.00. He has an hour for lunch and then finishes at 4.30. In the evening he does some gardening and looks after his{bees.} Then he watches T.V. and goes to bed at 11.00. He is a{churchwarden}at St Nicholas' Church.
